title: Yeh-Shen: A Cinderella Story from China
description: Over 1,000 years before the first European Cinderella story appeared, the tale of Yeh-Shen was part of China's storytelling tradition. "Executed with chromatic splendor--a unique combination of brilliance and restraint."--The Horn Book. Full-color illustrations.
author: Ai-Ling Louie
